none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 28, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
And this is your Monday. Completely pegged and bulldozing everything it its path, still drunk on the weekend and not ready to stop. Blown out, fukkd up, howling, clenched fist mania of the highest order...ABSTRAKT give you exactly what you want. Maximum distortion, maximum fury, and screaming bass solos (not kidding). ABSTRAKT
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-ToCvtmVJQ20/VgjYXeLXRrI/AAAAAAAANN4/93yReAtV3rI/s1600/Abstrakt%2Bcover.jpg //3.bp.blogspot.com/-ir5SeAg1cdc/VglBD_7GKII/AAAAAAAANOI/DCQqYD1IZz8/s1600/abstrakt%2Bspine.jpg

seo.title: Abstrakt - Distrakt demo 2011 - Terminal Escape
